text.section:
As part of its plans for data collection and Program evaluation described under subsections (a) and (b) of this section, the Baltimore City Health Department shall develop and implement a methodology:
For identifying Program hypodermic needles and syringes, such as through the use of bar coding or any other method approved by the oversight committee; and
To perform HIV antibody testing on the residue left in a sample of hypodermic needles and syringes returned to the Program.
